events.comment: Ce bloc sert à créer le pkStat s'il est manquant ou effacer les duplicatas si y'en a.

sub-events.comment: Multiple pkStats detected. Deleting the low level ones.
This is to fix an old bug, and should be removed. Kept as a safeguard.

action.name: Log
action.param: "Detected " & pkStats.PickedCount & " instances of pkStats. Deleting one."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Detected " & pkStats.PickedCount & " instances of pkStats. Deleting one."

sub-events.comment: pour donner l'illusion que le temps s'est écoulé, on ajuste le timer à une position aléatoire
le "wait 0.000001" est nécessaire pour que ça se fasse *après* que le combat soit initialisé.
all this is just for animation stuff

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You won against " & pokemon.AnimationName & " and receive " & xpReward & " XP."

events.comment: This function levels up the pkmn if xp is greater than required.

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Your " & pokemon.AnimationName & " has level up to " & pkStats.level & "!"
